p: All experiments were repeated three times independently. Data were collected, processed, and interpreted as mean ± standard error of mean (mean ± SEM). Survival rate and anticholinesterase effect of the crude extract on Oryzias javanicus were analyzed using (GraphPad Software, USA). Statistical analysis using one-way ANOVA followed by Dunnett's post hoc test, where P < 0.05, was considered statistically significant as treated groups were compared with untreated groups (control) using GraphPad Prism version 5.0 software (GraphPad Software, USA).
